pullRequest.title: MULE-17950: For multi level metadata, same values are retrieved even …
pullRequest.bodyText: …when changing key parts on SOAP connectors

nodes.bodyText: @alegmarra the value hardcoded here was added when the metadata cache was implemented but didn't match the getCategoryName() returned by the InvokeKeysResolver. Therefore I have also fixed that.

commit.message: MULE-17950: For multi level metadata, same values are retrieved even when changing key parts on SOAP connectors
Fix test, adding typeResolverInformation model property to json for assertions

afterCommit.message: Fix test, adding typeResolverInformation model property to json for assertions
